name: .LGP File Extension
summary: Learn about .LGP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Media archive that contains graphics, sounds, and other media used by the Final Fantasy VII and Final Fantasy VIII video games; developed by Squaresoft as a container format (similar to .PAK file) to store character data and other information.

content: Squaresoft merged with Enix in 2003 and became part of Square Enix.

Data from LGP files can be extracted and edited with LGP Tools. Modified archives can then be saved to change the appearance of characters and alter other aspects of the game. However, editing LGP files may corrupt the data and therefore should be done with caution.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
